scripts.cpanel:build: node ace build --production && echo 'Build complete for cPanel deployment'
scripts.cpanel:deploy: npm run cpanel:build && npm run cpanel:start
scripts.cpanel:setup: npm run cpanel:install:light && echo 'Dependencies installed successfully' && node ace migration:run && echo 'Migrations completed' && node ace db:seed && echo 'Database seeded successfully'
scripts.cpanel:setup:step: echo 'Step 1: Installing dependencies...' && npm run cpanel:install:light && echo 'Step 2: Running migrations...' && node ace migration:run && echo 'Step 3: Seeding database...' && node ace db:seed
scripts.cpanel:restart: echo 'Restart your Node.js app in cPanel Node.js Selector'
scripts.cpanel:logs: echo 'Check logs in cPanel Node.js Selector or error_log'
scripts.cpanel:status: echo 'Check status in cPanel Node.js Selector'
